document_data.name: Broadshield
document_data.Activities: He led the notorious outlaw group known as [[Broadshield's Beasts]], a gang notorious for kidnapping nobles.
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], Broadshield was instructed by [[Manshoon]] to capture [[Arclath Delcastle]] and [[Amarune Whitewave]] and deliver them to [[Alorglauvenemaus]] but the two managed to escape from the ambush and arrive at [[Castle Irlingstar]].
